project.description: Single job to run the manage project: /mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm

com.vectorcast.plugins.vectorcastexecuti.unixCommand:
export PATH=/home/vectorindia/gcc-4.1.2/bin:$PATH
export VECTORCAST_DIR=${LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR} export VCAST_RPTS_PRETTY_PRINT_HTML=FALSE cd ${LINUX_HARVESTER_DIR}
$VECTORCAST_DIR/manage --project "/mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm" --status $VECTORCAST_DIR/manage --project "/mnt/nfs/shared/Harvester_Coverage/VcTools.vcm" --release-locks
if [ -d harvester ]; then rm -rf harvester fi git checkout -- harvester git stash git checkout master git branch -D develop git checkout develop git pull origin develop
rm vcshell.* $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --metrics bash ./build.sh $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb clearmetrics --file=vc_sqlite3.c if [ -d cover ]; then rm -rf cover fi mkdir cover
cd cover $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -lc template GNU_CPP_41 $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast cover env create harvester $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -lc -e harvester option VCAST_APPEND_TO_TESTINSS TRUE $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -lc -e harvester option COVERAGE_IO_TYPE VCAST_COVERAGE_IO_BUFFERED $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -lc -e harvester option VCAST_DUMP_COVERAGE_AT_EXIT TRUE $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -lc -e harvester option VCAST_COVERAGE_FOR_HEADERS TRUE $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -lc -e harvester option VCAST_COVER_STATEMENTS_BY_BLOCK TRUE $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicover add_source_vcdb harvester ../vcshell.db ../getfiles.txt $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast -e harvester cover instrument statement
cd .. ./build.sh --vcast_coverage
cd build ./install.sh
